keyword: how many calories in a hot dog from costco
title: How Many Calories in a Costco Hot Dog?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a hot dog from Costco, with full nutrition facts, macros, sodium details, and preparation tweaks for the classic combo.
h1: How Many Calories in a Costco Hot Dog?
assumptions: Costco's standard 1/4 lb all-beef frankfurter on a steamed bun; no added condiments like ketchup or mustard.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact preparation, bun type, and any customizations; values based on typical Costco serving. Check in-store info when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard Costco hot dog with bun provides ~570 kcal, high in sodium and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add ketchup and mustard (1 tbsp each)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Costco hot dog with bun?
faqs.a: Approximately 570 kcal for the standard combo.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in a hot dog from Costco?
faqs.a: About 1570 mg, mostly from the frank and bun.

faqs.q: Are Costco hot dogs high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~34 g total fat per serving, with 13 g saturated.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Costco hot dog?
faqs.a: Around 20 g, mainly from the all-beef frank.

faqs.q: Does adding condiments change calories much?
faqs.a: Ketchup and mustard add ~25 kcal; relish or chili can add more.
